title: When will Ornn Get a Fucking skin?
body: Riot, get your heads out of your asses. Give us a skin for Ornn. It's been like three years you fucktards.

replies.body:
I'd love to see:

Papercraft (creating pillars of paper and a giant origami ram)
Elderwood (A druid-like skin, breathing faerie fire, pulling up roots, and summoning a literal ram as opposed to an energy one)
Odyssey (A surly old weaponsmith, legendary for his craft, but has isolated himself on the far reaches of space. A tech-y Ornn skin)
Mecha Kingdoms (I know, it's not even out yet, but when it returns, Ornn would be perfect)
There's a possible leak for elderwood ornn!{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Thats just a rumor based around an art work an intern did (who made Victorious Aarrox and Hextech Swain). It's not the official concept as it wasn't in her Riot section on the site.
I mean, the point of a leak is to take it with a grain of salt, but you can always be hopeful yknow, I also said possible
Iron Fist Ornn, his ult can be a steam train.
